statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 10 WHERE username = 'john_doe';

UPDATE player_profiles SET currency_balance = currency_balance + 50 WHERE level >= 5;
UPDATE player_profiles SET currency_balance = currency_balance - 25 WHERE username = 'jane_smith' AND level < 10;

UPDATE player_stats SET total_games_played = total_games_played + 1, highest_score = CASE WHEN highest_score < 1000 THEN 1000 ELSE highest_score END WHERE player_id = 456;
